description:
Ryo comes clean about the fact that he pretended to be Ami`s fiance to get close to Mami which infuriates her. She gets a letter from Ami who asks her to trust him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell Requiem Your Visage, Once Again
Wakare no Requiem: Ano Omokage o Mou Ichido
別れのレクイエム あの面影をもう一度
